title: G. K.'s Weekly
additional-notes: This is a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

The 1954 July-December CCE records renewals of 1927 US registrations for installments of 'The Return of Don Quixote' published in G. K.'s Weekly from September through November 1926.  We are not sure that those are still in force under current US law, but mention them here for completeness.
